Is it fun?!? Hell yeah it is! You can build giant star cruisers and battle stations on (or inside of) asteroids, and make star fighters and shuttles and stuff. You can set up giant mining stations on asteroids to rob nature of its treasures, and build guided missiles (I built a kamikaze ship one time) and have big ship to ship battles with other people! It's definitely worth $20 if you like building cool starships in the style of Minecraft.
